articles.author: Matt Roller
articles.title: Australia add three-time Ashes-winning coach Andy Flower to backroom staff - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Mastermind of England's 2009, 2010-11 and 2013 successes joins Australia squad on consultancy basis ahead of WTC final
articles.content: Andy Flower, Alastair Cook and Matt Prior pose with the Ashes urn in 2013  •  Gareth Copley/Getty Images

articles.author: Jihye Lee
articles.title: Australia's central bank hikes rates by 25 basis points, defies expectations - CNBC
articles.description: Economists polled by Reuters were widely expecting the central bank to hold its rates steady.
articles.content:
Lamp posts in front of the Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) building in Sydney, Australia, on Monday, Feb. 6, 2023.
The Reserve Bank of Australia on Tuesday again defied market expectations, raising … [+2779 chars]
